HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Armor Is Uncomfortable has been updated with a few new optional features for more punishing gameplay. Check them out in the mod options menu! Most importantly, you can now set custom discomfort values instead of the formula used by most items. See the workshop page on Steam for more details.

1.3 update. You'll need to upgrade to 1.3 to see the changes. - Pawns with locked apparel no longer get uncomfortable and don't get negative thoughts from discomfort. - Global Discomfort Modifier now functions, but for performance reasons it will only be updated when a pawn next changes their clothes.
